amendment.description: Page 4, line 2, after the period insert "Such term shall also include State-led projects (as defined in section 4007(a)(2) of the WIIN Act) ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 115-186 to enhance federal cooperation in planning and construction of State-led water storage projects by ensuring such projects are eligible for permit streamlining under this bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. LaMalfa.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
